name: Ninza
storyline: The Mo0n has ascended and torn off parts of our world. The islands floating up in the sky have since become a savage battlefield. Indeed the Mo0n has picked up its chosen ones and blessed them with lunar magic. They now recklessly battle each other to satisfy the Mo0n's thirst of blood and bones. You are one of them: a Ninza.
summary:
Ninza is a 2D multiplayer fighting game. Instead of hitting directly your opponents, you attempt to crush or hurl them off-screen by throwing pieces of the level.

Since the procedurally generated layout of the battlefield is being continuously altered, opportunities to shine but also to die can occur at any time. To survive you must think and react fast.

Every character got their own moveset and abilities, so that any battle to come will deliver for sure its share of unexpected outcomes and crazy comebacks. Indeed, the game is actually providing a lot of space to set up creative strategies, tricks and traps.
